topic.title: EMS Injury Incident Description Section - conformance rules

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="11374-6" Injury Incident Description Section (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
Contains zero or one [0..1] text
Contains zero or one [0..1] title

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry
This entry SHALL conform to Derived Entry template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.24)
This entry SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="69543-7" Injury Cause (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.3.1 ICD-10)
Causes are in ICD-10 chapter XX

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry
This entry SHALL conform to Derived Entry template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.24)
This entry Contains zero or one [0..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67494-5" Injury Mechanism (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet MechanismOfInjury 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.1 STATIC

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry
This entry SHALL conform to Derived Entry template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.24)
This entry Contains zero or one [0..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67495-2" Trauma Center Critieria (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain at least one [1..*] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet TraumaCenterCriteria 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.3 STATIC

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry
This entry SHALL conform to Derived Entry template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.24)
This entry SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67496-0" Other injury risk factors (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain at least one [1..*] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet InjuryRiskFactor 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.4 STATIC

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry
This entry SHALL conform to Derived Entry template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.24)
This entry SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67497-8" Location of impact on the vehicle (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet VehicleImpactArea 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.5 STATIC

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry
This entry SHALL conform to Derived Entry template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.24)
This entry SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67498-6" Location of patient in vehicle (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet VehiclePassengerLocation 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.6 STATIC

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry
This entry SHALL conform to Derived Entry template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.24)
This entry SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67499-4" Safety equipment (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain at least one [1..*] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet SafetyEquipmentType 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.7 STATIC

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry
This entry SHALL conform to Derived Entry template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.24)
This entry SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67500-9" Airbag deployment (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain zero or more [0..*] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet AirbagStatus 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.8 STATIC

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry
This entry SHALL conform to Derived Entry template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.24)
This entry MAY contain zero or one [0..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67501-7" Height of fall (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type PQ, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet STATIC

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry
This entry SHALL conform to Derived Entry template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.24)
This entry MAY contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="69463-8" Suspected intentional or unintentional disaster (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain at least one [1..*] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet DisasterType 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.9 STATIC
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="11374-6" Injury Incident Description Section (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
Contains zero or one [0..1] title
Contains zero or one [0..1] text
